resources.string: Find the correct tile on the grid as fast as you can.
It has no end play until you beat your record.
Before the tile appears, you must memorize the matrix, after a few seconds it disappears.
The time to complete the level is limited if it reaches zero you have lost.
Difficulty increases progressively with each new tile.
The matrix randomly changes with each new tile.
The token is visible for a short time if you blink you won"'t see it.
You need to collect %1$d stars in Classic mode to unlock this mode.
Classic mode but the token may not be on the grid or may be on the grid multiple times.
You need to collect %1$d stars in Endless mode to unlock this mode.
Endless mode but the token may not be on the grid or may be on the grid multiple times.
You need to collect %1$d stars in Memory mode to unlock this mode.
Memory mode but the token may not be on the grid or may be on the grid multiple times.
You need to collect %1$d stars in Time Trial mode to unlock this mode.
Time Trial mode but the token may not be on the grid or may be on the grid multiple times.
You need to collect %1$d stars in Incremental mode to unlock this mode.
Incremental mode but the token may not be on the grid or may be on the grid multiple times.
You need to collect %1$d stars in Move mode to unlock this mode.
Move mode but the token may not be on the grid or may be on the grid multiple times.
You need to collect %1$d stars in Blink mode to unlock this mode.
Blink mode but the token may not be on the grid or may be on the grid multiple times.
You need to collect %1$d stars in Rotate mode to unlock this mode.
Rotate mode but the token may not be on the grid or may be on the grid multiple times.
An error occurred while trying to save settings.
All progress but achievements will be deleted, continue?
You need %1$d stars in this stage to unlock this level.
You need %1$d stars in this mode to unlock this stage.
Shows the location of the next two tiles.
Change the master tile for a different one and reset time to find it.
Find the tile (1) on the grid (2) before time runs out (3).
Find the tile (1) on the grid (2) before time runs out (3), with no limit to the number of tiles to search for (4).
Find the tile (1) on the grid (2) before time runs out (3), memorize the grid quickly because it disappears.
Find the tile (1) on the grid (2), you have a time limit (3) to find as many as you can (4).
Find the tile (1) on the grid (2) before time runs out (3), with no limit to the number of tiles to search for (4), the difficulty increases.
Find the tile (1) on the grid (2) before the time runs out (3), the grid moves with each new tile.
Find the token (1) that is only visible for an instant on the grid (2) before time runs out (3).
Find the tile (1) on the grid (2) before the time runs out (3), some tiles will rotate.
Find the tile (1) on the grid (2) before the time runs out (3), if the tile is not there click on (4).
Find the tile (1) on the grid (2) before the time runs out (3), without limit of tiles to search (4), if the tile is not there click on (5).
Find the tile (1) on the grid (2) before the time runs out (3), quickly memorize the grid because it disappears if the tile is not there click on (4).
Find the tile (1) on the grid (2), you have a time limit (3) to find as many as you can (4), if the tile is not there click on (5).
Find the tile (1) on the grid (2) before time runs out (3), with no limit to the number of tile to search for (4), if the tile is not there click on (5), the difficulty increases.
Find the tile (1) on the grid (2) before the time runs out (3), if the tile is not there click on (4), the grid moves with each new tile.
Find the tile (1) that is only visible for an instant on the grid (2) before the time runs out (3), if the tile is not there click on (4).
Find the tile (1) on the grid (2) before the time runs out (3), if the tile is not there click on (4), some tiles will rotate.
An error occurred in the download.
Get more stars on level %1$d of stage %2$d.
Beat your points on level %1$d of stage %2$d.
Get 2 stars on level %1$d of stage %2$d without using any power-ups.
Complete level %1$d of stage %2$d without any failures.
Find more tiles on level %1$d of stage %2$d.
If you quit you will lose the challenge!

Get all stars in all modes

Get a star in each level of each normal mode
